origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'Government.get_latest_announcement', 'description': 'Get the latest government announcement on a specific topic.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the topic of the announcement.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'announcement', 'description': 'the text of the latest government announcement'}]}, {'name': 'RealEstate.analyze_policy_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of a new policy on real estate transactions.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policy_text', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the text of the policy'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'the analysis of the policy impact on real estate transactions'}]}, {'name': 'TaxOffice.get_local_tax_rate', 'description': 'Get the current tax rate for a specific region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the region name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'tax_rate', 'description': 'the current tax rate for the region'}]}, {'name': 'ElectronicTaxOffice.guide_tax_declaration', 'description': 'Guide on how to declare taxes through the electronic tax office.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'guide', 'description': 'the guide on tax declaration'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要了解中国契税的最新动态。首先，获取最新的关于契税改革的政府公告。然后，分析这些政策对房地产交易的影响。接着，查询我所在地区的契税率。最后，了解如何通过电子税务局进行契税的申报。
